commit.message:
Feature/page system (#5)

* Started to work on Page CRUD. Upload is 50% functional, backend should be done.

* Upload system is done, backend is not complete.

* Added illustration column in db + front end handling. Backend still not done.

* Page storage + minio configuration are done and working.

* Page storage + file upload are working

* Started refactoring, almost there.

* Small fixes to avoid regressions

* Editing not working when updating the image

* Edit is fixed, dunno how, just went from vue 2 syntax to vue 3 syntax. Still need to clean up and find equivalants, but I now have my files again on submit.

* Page system is done and functional.

Co-authored-by: josephlevarato <joseph@idusante.fr>
